20 void Send(const char* c, unsigned int i)
21 {
22  struct sockaddr_in addr = i ? saddr : caddr;
23  if(!addr.sin_port)
24  return;
25  if(sendto(sock, c, strlen(c), 0,
26  (struct sockaddr *) &addr, sizeof(addr)) < 1)
27  err_msg(UDP, 0, "problem while sending");
28 }
29 
30 char* Recv(int i)
31 {
32  char buf[256];
33  ssize_t len;
34  unsigned int addrlen = 0;
35  struct sockaddr_in addr;
36 
37 #ifndef __linux__
38  fd_set read_flags, write_flags;
39  struct timeval waitd = {10, 0};
40 
41  FD_ZERO(&read_flags);
42  FD_ZERO(&write_flags);
43  FD_SET(sock, &read_flags);
44  FD_SET(sock, &write_flags);
45 #endif
46 
47  memset(buf, 0, 256);
48  addr = i ? saddr : caddr;
49 
50 #ifndef __linux__
51  if(select(sock + 1, &read_flags, &write_flags, (fd_set*)0, &waitd) < 0)
52  return NULL;
53  if(FD_ISSET(sock, &read_flags)) {
54  FD_CLR(sock, &read_flags);
55 #endif
56  if((len = recvfrom(sock, buf, 256, 0, (struct sockaddr*)&addr, &addrlen)) < 0)
57  err_msg(UDP, 0, "recvfrom() failed");
58  buf[255] = '\0';
59  return strndup(buf, strlen(buf));
60 #ifndef __linux__
61  }
62 #endif
63  return NULL;
64 }

66 void* server_thread(void* data)
67 {
68  VM* vm = (VM*)data;
69  while(vm->is_running) {
70  char* buf;
71  int index;
72 
73  buf = Recv(0);
74  if(!buf)
75  continue;
76  if(strncmp(buf, "bonjour", 7) == 0);
77  else if( strncmp(buf, "quit", 4) == 0) {
78  vm->is_running = 0;
79  vm->wakeup();
80  } else if( strncmp(buf, "-", 1) == 0) {
81  buf += 2;
82  shreduler_remove(vm->shreduler, (VM_Shred)vector_at(vm->shred, atoi(buf) - 1), 1);
83  buf -= 2;
84  } else if( strncmp(buf, "+", 1) == 0) {
85  buf += 2;
86  compile(data, (m_str)buf);
87  buf -= 2;
88  } else if( strncmp(buf, "loop", 4) == 0) {
90  index = atoi(buf + 5);
91  shreduler_set_loop(vm->shreduler, index);
92  } else
93  compile(data, (m_str)buf);
94  free(buf);
95  }
96  return NULL;
97 }

99 #ifndef __linux__
100 static void set_nonblock(int socket)
101 {
102  int flags;
103  flags = fcntl(socket, F_GETFL, 0);
104  fcntl(socket, F_SETFL, flags | O_NONBLOCK);
105 }
106 #endif
107 
108 int server_init(char* hostname, int port)
109 {
110  struct hostent * host;
111  sock = socket(PF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, IPPROTO_UDP);
112  if(sock < 0) {
113  err_msg(UDP, 0, "can't create socket");
114  return -1;
115  }
116 
117 #ifndef __linux__
118  set_nonblock(sock);
119 #endif
120 
121  memset(&saddr, 0, sizeof(saddr));
122  saddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
123  host = gethostbyname(hostname);
124  if(!host) {
125  saddr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(hostname);
126  if( saddr.sin_addr.s_addr == -1 ) {
127  saddr.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
128  err_msg(UDP, 0, "%s not found. setting hostname to localhost", hostname);
129  char** host = &hostname;
130  *host = "localhost";
131  }
132  } else bcopy( host->h_addr_list[0], (char *)&saddr.sin_addr, host->h_length );
133  saddr.sin_port = htons(port);
134  if (bind(sock, (struct sockaddr *) &saddr, sizeof(saddr)) < 0) {
135  err_msg(UDP, 0, "can't bind");
136  return -1;
137  }
138  return 1;
139 }
140 
141 void server_destroy(pthread_t t)
142 {
143 #ifdef __linux__
144  pthread_cancel(t);
145  pthread_join(t, NULL);
146 #endif
147  shutdown(sock, SHUT_RDWR);
148 }
